item.title: 除亚洲和欧洲外，所有地区的商务旅行支出均有所恢复
item.description: 据一家行业协会周一发布的报告称，随着企业恢复亲身聚会和会议，2023 年北美、拉丁美洲、中东和非洲的全球商务旅行支出将恢复到大流行前的水平。【原文：Global business travel spending in 2023 recovered to pre-pandemic levels in North America, Latin America, the Middle East and Africa as companies resumed in-person gatherings and conferences, according to report released Monday by an industry association.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 旗下 TNT 体育公司竞标 NBA 转播权
item.description: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 旗下的体育网络 TNT 体育公司正在重新竞标美国国家篮球协会比赛的转播权，该公司周一表示，已与其中一家竞争转播商的报价相匹配，并可能获得比赛转播权。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery's sports network TNT Sports, which is re-bidding for the broadcast rights for National Basketball Association games, said on Monday it had matched an offer from one of the competing broadcasters and may secure the rights to broadcast the games.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，美国众议院小组要求 CrowdStrike 首席执行官就中断事件作证
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周一援引国会小组的一封信报道，美国众议院国土安全委员会要求 CrowdStrike 首席执行官乔治-库尔茨（George Kurtz）就最近发生的大规模全球故障作证。【原文：U.S. House of Representatives Homeland Security Committee has called on CrowdStrike CEO George Kurtz to testify about a recent massive global outage, the Washington Post reported on Monday, citing a letter by the congressional panel.】

item.title: 连锁影院 AMC 达成新的再融资协议
item.description: AMC Entertainment Holdings 周一表示，该公司已与债权人达成协议，将高达 24.5 亿美元的债务期限从 2026 年延长至 2029 年及以后。【原文：AMC Entertainment Holdings said on Monday it had reached an agreement with creditors that extends up to $2.45 billion of debt maturities from 2026 to 2029 and beyond.】

item.title: 惠誉称：CrowdStrike 中断对保险公司的打击有限
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）表示，CrowdStrike公司的安全软件更新故障导致上周全球互联网服务中断，全球保险和再保险业很可能不会因此受到重大财务影响。【原文：The global insurance and reinsurance industry is likely to avoid any major financial impact from the outage sparked by CrowdStrike's glitchy security software update that disrupted internet services worldwide last week, Fitch Ratings said.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司正式向奥地利和荷兰出售 C-390；2027 年开始交付
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周一签署合同，正式向荷兰和奥地利出售 9 架 C-390 千禧型军用飞机，进一步扩大了其国防订单积压。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer on Monday signed the contract to formalize the sale of nine C-390 Millennium military aircraft to the Netherlands and Austria, further expanding its defense order backlog.】

item.title: 美国电话电报公司（AT&T）称，2 月份的无线故障阻断了 9200 多万次通话
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会在路透社看到的一份报告中说，2 月份 AT&T 公司全国范围的无线中断持续了 12 个多小时，阻断了 9200 多万次语音通话，阻止了 25000 多次拨打 911 的尝试。【原文：A nationwide AT&T wireless outage in February that lasted for more than 12 hours blocked more than 92 million voice calls and prevented more than 25,000 attempts to reach 911, the U.S. Federal Communications Commission said in a report seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 保时捷淡化电动车雄心，称过渡需要 "数年时间
item.description: 豪华汽车制造商保时捷周一表示，预计向电动汽车过渡所需的时间将比想象的要长，该公司此前曾表示，其目标是到 2030 年实现 80% 的销量为纯电动汽车。【原文：Luxury carmaker Porsche expects the transition to electric vehicles to take longer than it thought, it said on Monday, having previously said its aim was for 80% of sales to be all-electric by 2030.】

item.title: 巴克莱试图削减英国投资者 7.2 亿美元的 "黑池 "诉讼费
item.description: 巴克莱银行周一要求伦敦高等法院将一项价值高达 5.6 亿英镑（约合 7.2 亿美元）的股东诉讼减半以上，该诉讼指控这家英国银行在其私人 "黑池 "交易平台方面误导市场。【原文：Barclays on Monday asked London's High Court to more than halve a shareholders' lawsuit worth up to 560 million pounds ($720 million) accusing the British bank of misleading the market about its private "dark pool" trading platforms.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，收购公司 L Catterton 向美泰提出收购要约
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周一表示，奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH）支持的私募股权公司 L Catterton 已向美国玩具制造商美泰提出收购要约。【原文：L Catterton, the private equity firm backed by luxury goods giant LVMH , has approached U.S. toy maker Mattel with an acquisition offer, people familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 波音公司拥有的 Wisk 预计将在 "十年后 "开始运载乘客
item.description: 波音公司旗下的 Wisk Aero 公司首席执行官周一表示，随着该公司与美国监管机构合作获得批准，预计其无人驾驶空中出租车将在 "十年后 "开始载客。【原文：Boeing-owned Wisk Aero expects its pilotless air-taxi to begin carrying passengers "later in the decade" as it works with the U.S. regulator to secure approvals, its CEO said on Monday, amid scepticism among industry analysts about certification timelines.】

item.title: 美国债券市场对拜登退出的反应是 "特朗普交易 "逆转
item.description: 美国政府债券投资者周一平仓了部分因预期共和党人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将第二次当选美国总统而进行的交易，因为美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）退出总统竞选被认为提高了民主党的当选几率。【原文：U.S. government bond investors on Monday unwound some of the trades that were put in place on expectations of a second U.S. presidency of Republican Donald Trump, as U.S. President Joe Biden's exit from the presidential race was seen as improving the Democrats' elections odds.】

item.title: 夏季旅行热潮不足以刺激航空公司盈利
item.description: 创纪录的暑期旅行需求被认为会给航空公司带来丰厚的收益，但季度报告却不尽如人意。【原文：Record summer travel demand was tipped to translate into bumper earnings for airlines - but quarterly reports are looking less than stellar.】

item.title: 安捷伦将以 9.25 亿美元收购合同药品制造商 Biovectra
item.description: 安捷伦科技公司（Agilent Technologies）周一表示，将以 9.25 亿美元的价格收购合同药品制造商 Biovectra，以扩大其为生物技术公司和医学研究人员提供的服务组合。【原文：Agilent Technologies said on Monday it will acquire contract drug manufacturer Biovectra for $925 million to expand its portfolio of services offered to biotech companies and medical researchers.】

item.title: 巴西央行推迟推出流行支付系统的新功能
item.description: 巴西央行周一表示，其广受欢迎的 Pix 即时支付系统将于明年 6 月推出一项旨在自动支付经常性账单的新功能，而不是原定的今年 10 月。【原文：Brazil's central bank said on Monday a new feature for its popular Pix instant payment system aimed at automatically paying recurring bills will be launched next June instead of this October, as had been originally scheduled.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司减持中国比亚迪股份至5%以下
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）将其在比亚迪的持股降至 5%以下，这可能是伯克希尔最后一次披露在中国最大电动汽车生产商比亚迪的股票销售情况。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway reduced its stake in BYD to below 5%, in what could be the final time Berkshire discloses stock sales in China's largest producer of electric vehicles.】

item.title: 中国卡车和食品制造商试图在油罐车丑闻后重获消费者信任
item.description: 周一，中国卡车制造商发布了食用油运输车辆安全标准，在有关油罐车运输食用油的报道再次引发人们对食品污染的担忧之后，这些公司试图重新赢得消费者的信任。【原文：China's truck manufacturers released safety standards for vehicles carrying edible oil on Monday, as firms attempt to regain consumer trust after a report about fuel tankers transporting cooking oil rekindled fears about food contamination.】

item.title: Alphabet 公布第二季度业绩增长两位数，人工智能应用、成本膨胀成焦点
item.description: 受人工智能云计算服务需求稳定和广告市场回暖的推动，谷歌母公司 Alphabet 预计将公布季度营收增长近 14%，连续第四个季度实现两位数增长。【原文：Google-parent Alphabet is expected to report a nearly 14% rise in quarterly revenue, its fourth straight quarter of double-digit growth, driven by steady demand for its artificial intelligence-powered cloud computing services and an uptick in the ad market.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，麦当劳将延长 5 美元超值套餐的使用期限
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引一份公司备忘录报道，汉堡连锁店麦当劳将在最初的四周窗口期后继续在其大部分美国餐厅提供 5 美元超值套餐。【原文：Burger chain McDonald's would continue to offer $5 value meal at most of its U.S. restaurants beyond the initial four-week window, Bloomberg News reported on Monday citing a company memo.】

item.title: 日本航空公司订购 10 架波音 787-9，并获得另外 10 架的选择权
item.description: 日本航空公司和波音公司周一在范堡罗航展的联合媒体吹风会上表示，日本航空公司已经订购了10架波音787-9飞机，并同意再订购10架。【原文：Japan Airlines has ordered 10 Boeing 787-9 aircraft and agreed options for 10 more, the two companies said at a joint media briefing at the Farnborough Airshow on Monday.】

item.title: 停电影响持续，CrowdStrike股价将扩大跌幅
item.description: 周一，CrowdStrike 的股价在盘前交易中下跌了 5%，延续了连跌走势，此前几位分析师下调了该公司的股票评级，原因是担心上周发生的全球网络中断事件会带来财务影响。【原文：Shares of CrowdStrike fell 5% in premarket trading on Monday, extending their streak of losses, after several analysts downgraded the stock on concerns over the financial fallout from the global cyber outage last week.】

item.title: 航空公司利润下滑和飞机延误给航展蒙上阴影
item.description: 瑞安航空季度利润的骤降给周一开幕的范堡罗航展蒙上了一层阴影，航空业的领导者们已经开始为供应链障碍、飞机延误和减排计划的搁浅而焦虑不安。【原文：A plunge in Ryanair's quarterly profits cast a shadow over the opening of the Farnborough Airshow on Monday, where aviation leaders were already fretting about supply chain snags, aircraft delays and floundering plans to cut emissions.】

item.title: 达美航空受网络故障影响，周一再取消600个航班
item.description: 达美航空公司周一取消了 600 多个航班，因为这家美国航空公司在上周的全球网络故障后仍在努力恢复运营，即使其他航空公司也在从这一事件中恢复过来。【原文：Delta Air Lines canceled more than 600 flights on Monday, as the U.S. air carrier continued to struggle to restore operations after last week's global cyber outage, even as other airlines were recovering from the incident.】

item.title: 特斯拉第二季度利润率可能下滑；机器人出租车和人工智能企业成为关注焦点
item.description: 特斯拉第二季度的利润率创下了五年多来的新低，这家电动汽车制造商可能会在周二发布报告，其首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）预计将加倍努力推进公司的机器人出租车计划和人工智能产品。【原文：Tesla's second-quarter margin hit a more than five-year low, the electric vehicle maker is likely to report on Tuesday, and its CEO Elon Musk is expected to double down on the company's robotaxi plans and AI products.】

item.title: 独家报道：信件显示，尤尼吉尔公司要求巴西国家石油公司赔偿巴西化肥厂的损失
item.description: 路透社看到的一封法律信函显示，巴西化工公司 Unigel 要求国营巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）赔偿两家租赁化肥厂的损失，这标志着重开化肥厂的谈判再次受挫。【原文：Brazilian chemical company Unigel is demanding compensation from state-run Petrobras for losses on two leased fertilizer plants, a legal letter seen by Reuters showed, marking another setback in negotiations to reopen the plants.】

item.title: Verizon 的定制计划使新增用户数量超过预期
item.description: Verizon 通信公司周一发布报告称，第二季度新增无线用户数量超过预期，这主要得益于对其灵活计划的强劲需求，这些计划还以折扣价提供流媒体服务，包括 Netflix 和 Disney+。【原文：Verizon Communications added more wireless subscribers than expected in the second quarter, it reported on Monday, boosted by strong demand for its flexible plans that also have streaming services, including Netflix and Disney+, at discounted prices.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯今年的经济增长因石油产量持续下降而受到影响
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，由于石油减产时间延长，沙特今年的经济增长速度可能是海湾合作委员会（GCC）国家中最慢的国家之一。【原文：Saudi Arabia's economic growth will likely be one of the slowest among the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) countries this year, according to a Reuters poll of economists who lowered growth forecasts from three months ago due to extended oil output cuts.】

item.title: 马斯克称，特斯拉明年将推出供内部使用的仿人机器人
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周一表示，特斯拉将于明年小批量生产仿人机器人，供公司内部使用。【原文：Tesla will have humanoid robots in low production for the company's internal use next year, CEO Elon Musk said on Monday, months after he announced that the rollout would be by the end of 2024.】

item.title: 运力过剩影响价格，加航下调 2024 年核心利润预期
item.description: 加航周一下调了全年核心利润预期，原因是某些市场的运力过剩影响了其定价能力。【原文：Air Canada cut its full-year core profit forecast on Monday, as over-capacity in certain markets impacted its pricing power.】

item.title: 地缘政治重挫市场步伐
item.description: 随着投资者面对欧洲日益分裂、美国孤立主义和世界贸易脉搏放缓的前景，政治因素已将全球市场从创纪录的高峰推翻，并在动荡的几周内凸显出来。【原文：Politics has toppled global markets from record peaks and over a turbulent few weeks stepped to the fore as investors confront the prospect of an increasingly fractious Europe, isolationist America and a slowdown in the pulse of world trade.】
